title: Blanca Blanco dons blue string bikini as she enjoys a sunny day at the beach in Malibu
text:
It may be October, but the sun is still shining in Malibu, California.

And on Saturday, Blanca Blanco took to the beach to take advantage of the warm fall weather.

The 38-year-old actress was spotted applying baby oil to try to boost her tan while donning a skimpy string bikini.

Beach babe: Blanca Blanco, 38, took to the beach in Malibu, California on Saturday to take advantage of the warm fall weather

Blanco's thong bikini featured tiny straps that made for minimal tan lines.

The Betrayed actress wore her hair up in a curly ponytail for the sandy outing, accessorizing with gold hoop earrings.

She wore a wirey pair of sunglasses to shade her eyes from the sun, while slathering on baby oil to attract some sunshine.

Blanco carried a multicolored towel with her that she posed with in a number of pictures.

Colorful: Blanco carried a multicolored towel with her that she posed with in a number of pictures

Bronzed: The 38-year-old actress was spotted applying baby oil to try to boost her tan while donning a skimpy string bikini

Golden glow: The Betrayed actress wore her hair up in a curly ponytail for the sandy outing, accessorizing with gold hoop earrings

Sunshine: Blanca wore a wirey pair of sunglasses to shade her eyes from the sun, while slathering on baby oil to attract some sunshine

Blanco became a media sensation last year when she attended the Golden Globe Awards in a crimson Atria Couture gown.

Her wardrobe choice flew in the fashion of the evening's fashion trend, which was to wear black in order to signal support for the Time's Up movement.

Blanco told The Hollywood Reporter that her dress was one of only a few that survived when her home was destroyed by the Woolsey Fire destroyed.

'I grabbed maybe six dresses, my passport and my bunny. But I did save my Golden Globes dress,' she said.

LA weather: It may be October, but the sun is still shining in Malibu

That thong: Blanco's thong bikini featured tiny straps that made for minimal tan lines

Whoops: The star became a media sensation last year when she attended the Golden Globe Awards in a crimson Atria Couture gown.
description: On Saturday, Blanca Blanco took advantage of the warm fall weather. The actress was spotted applying baby oil to try to boost her tan while donning a skimpy string bikini.
